title: Beyond the Reach
description: A wealthy hunter and his young guide become trapped in the desert - a deadly survival game begins.

description: An English movie about love that blossoms in the autumn of life.

description: A documentary exploring what would happen to Earth if humans suddenly disappeared.

title: A Ghost Story
description: In this singular exploration of legacy, loss, and the bonds of love, a recently deceased, white-sheeted ghost returns to his suburban home to try to reconnect with his bereft wife.

description: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues that he is a Cro-Magnon who has survived more than 14,000 years.

title: Ink
description: A mysterious creature known as Ink steals a child's soul in hopes of using it as a bargaining chip to join the Incubi - the group of supernatural beings responsible for creating nightmares.

description: Two strangers discover they can teleport into each other's lives, but their connection comes with a dangerous price.

title: Monsters
description: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion, a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the US border.

title: The Ghastly Love of Johnny X
originalTitle: The Ghastly Love of Johnny X
description: A rock-and-roll space alien and his gang of juvenile delinquents crash-land on Earth and must find a way to get back home.

title: Time Trap
description: A professor enters a cave and goes missing. His students go in after him and discover that time passes differently inside the cave.

title: Europa Report
description: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

title: The Signal
description: Three college students on a road trip across the Southwest experience a detour: the tracking of a computer genius who has already hacked into MIT and exposed their secrets.

title: City Shadows
description: In a city ruled by corruption, a detective fights to reveal the truth behind a high-profile murder.

title: Coherence
description: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.

title: Stalker
description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: They Look Like People
description: A troubled man suspects that people around him are turning into evil creatures. Is it paranoia or reality?

title: Absentia
description: A woman and her sister begin to link a mysterious tunnel to a series of disappearances, including that of her own husband.

title: Creep
description: A videographer answers a Craigslist ad for a one-day job in a remote town to film a man for the day, only to discover that his client is not who he appears to be.

title: The Invitation
description: While attending a dinner party at his former home, a man thinks his ex-wife and her new husband have sinister intentions for their guests.

title: The Endless
description: Two brothers return to the cult they escaped from years ago, only to discover that the group's beliefs may be more real than they thought.

title: Resolution
description: A man imprisons his estranged meth-addicted friend in an isolated cabin to force him through a week of sobriety, but the cabin's dark past soon becomes apparent.

title: Triangle
description: A group of friends suffer a yachting accident and take refuge on a cruise drifting on the open sea, but quickly realize they were better off on the upturned yacht.

title: The Void
description: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.

title: Oculus
description: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

title: The House of the Devil
description: A college student takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret.

title: Enemy
description: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

title: Take Shelter
description: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

title: The Lodge
description: A soon-to-be stepmom is snowed in with her fianc√©'s two children at a remote holiday village. Just as relations begin to thaw between the trio, some strange and frightening events take place.

title: Saint Maud
description: A pious nurse becomes dangerously obsessed with saving the soul of her dying patient.

title: Kill List
description: Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels.

title: The Blackcoat's Daughter
description: Two girls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break.

title: Bug
description: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.
